# Copilot Instructions for Helda V2 Web App

<!-- Use this file to provide workspace-specific custom instructions to Copilot. For more details, visit https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/copilot-customization#_use-a-githubcopilotinstructionsmd-file -->

## Project Overview
This is a modern React TypeScript web application built with Vite, featuring:
- Splash page with animations
- Authentication system with login/logout
- Dashboard components with routing
- Figma Dev integration optimized structure

## Development Guidelines

### Component Structure
- Follow atomic design principles for components
- Use TypeScript interfaces for all props
- Implement responsive design using CSS Grid/Flexbox
- Structure components for easy Figma Dev integration

### Authentication
- Use context-based authentication state management
- Implement protected routes for dashboard access
- Store auth tokens securely

### Styling
- Use CSS modules or styled-components approach
- Implement a design system compatible with Figma tokens
- Ensure mobile-first responsive design

### State Management
- Use React Context for global state
- Implement proper loading and error states
- Follow React best practices for state updates

### Figma Dev Integration
- Structure components with clear prop interfaces
- Use semantic HTML for better accessibility
- Implement consistent naming conventions
- Create reusable component library structure
